name: Artists.Relationships
desc: The relationships for an artist resource.

items.name: albums
items.desc: The albums associated with the artist. By default, albums includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 25 default, 100 maximum

items.name: genres
items.desc: The genres associated with the artist. By default, genres not included. Fetch limits: None

items.name: music-videos
items.desc: The music videos associated with the artist. By default, musicVideos not included. Fetch limits: 25 default, 100 maximum

items.name: playlists
items.desc: The playlists associated with the artist. By default, playlists not included. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum

items.name: station
items.desc: The station associated with the artist. By default, station not included.Fetch limits: None (one station).
